general_info.summary: This text appears to be a list of various programs, schools, reports, and initiatives at Sharda University. It includes academic programs for 2025-26, details about the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research. Additionally, it mentions reports like the Examination Annual Report and Academic Bank of Credits (ABC), feedback mechanisms, university brochures, information about the university's leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, and foundational documents. It also highlights various skill development and awareness initiatives, including language and communication skills, soft skills, technology trends, entrepreneurship, innovation, and FM Radio.

School of Medical Sciences & Research (SMS&R)

programs.programName: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
eligibilityCriteria: Completion of a recognized high school diploma with a minimum GPA of 3.0.
Successful completion of Advanced Mathematics and Physics courses.
English proficiency: TOEFL score of 80 or IELTS score of 6.5.
requiredDocuments: Copy of passport or national ID.

eligibilityCriteria: Bachelor's degree in any discipline from an accredited institution.
Minimum of 2 years of relevant professional work experience.
GMAT or GRE score (minimum GMAT 600 or GRE equivalent).
requiredDocuments: Essays (2) - one on career goals, one on a challenging experience.
Letters of recommendation (3) from professional or academic sources.

career_path.summary: This text lists potential career paths available after completing a specific course, including roles such as professors and healthcare workers, as well as positions in forensic science, government institutions like the National Institute of Health and Food and Drug Administration, the armed forces, and various private and public medical and research institutions.
